name: Body paint
description:
Story:

So King of Stones wants more paintings, and his forrest if filled with zombies that cannot paint. 

So sharpen you stick and make some marveles art... i don't know where you will get some paint, just improvise.  Now go, King is not a patient Stone.

W/A/S/D to move 

SPACE to slice

ESC to rest

One hour a day jam: #Sticks and Stones

Solo dev, art and sound, a bit less than 20h in total.
